attributes.action: Take the power from pupils in Primary and Secondary schools within the UK to make false allegations against teachers and other school staff and be believed!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This has happened numerous times within the area I work in, and recently a teacher has been suspended for defending himself in school when  being attacked by a secondary school pupil! The pupil has remained at school, thus a danger to children and staff within the school, and the teacher is undergoing an investigation even though he has clearly done nothing wrong!

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
